Text:
Finally, I found proper and matching subtiles. I've tried a few and their transcription was messed up with wrong words, making the dialogs confusing. Also none of them synced with the Bluray release. The following is the only good subtitles file I found for this release:

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4635791/lion-of-the-desert-en
